mapper.select: select * from donation dn join donor dr on dn.donor_idx = dr.donor_idx where donation_delete = "N" and donation_duration < now()
select * from donation dn join donor dr on dn.donor_idx = dr.donor_idx where donation_idx = #{donationIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_email, user_pw, user_nickname, user_image, user_point_balance, user_donation_balance, user_leave) values (#{userEmail}, #{userPw}, #{userNickname}, #{userImage}, #{userPointBalance}, #{userDonationBalance}, #{userLeave})
mapper.update: update user set user_leave = "Y" where user_email = #{userEmail}
